ygData.subject: RE: Question about Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, according to some friends that went there (and from other things I have heard) at least some things give a negative faction hit against queencristothex
ygData.messageBody:
Well, according to some friends that went there (and from other things I
have heard) at least some things give a negative faction hit against
queencristothex (or something like that)... Whatever it actually is I
believe this is the same faction(unless there is a very slight spelling
difference) that goes UP when you do the Tier'Dal Necro quests (in addition
to thedead and maybe some others). Also I remember when speaking to various
NPCs in the Lodge, them talking about being faithful servants of our queen.
This leads me to believe that Queen whatshername is the Queen of the
Tier'Dal.

Now you may never notice a difference in how the people in the Lodge regard
you after taking lots of hits to the queen faction (since they are part of
the dead faction). Currently the Tier'Dal King and Queen are not in the
game (as far as I know at least); however, since we are supposed to be her
servants it would seem to be a bad idea to have bad faction with her at
least as far as role playing goes.

In addition, just because she isn't around now doesn't mean she won't be in
the future (or at least that faction) and I really don't want to screw up
one of my few good factions since that might screw me over in the future
(i.e. Friend: Hey look they just added the Tier'Dal queen and she gives some
great quests for high level items Me: well I'm KoS to the queen now cause I
spent time in Mistmoore... guess I can't do the quests... or I have to get
10000000 fire beetle eyes)

Now most of this is just guessing from little pieces of information picked
up in the game. This leads me to a rant: Why don't we KNOW this stuff???
If I'm a Tier'Dal Necromancer I sure as hell should know who my queen is,
who are our allies, and who are our enemies and not have to make guesses as
to all this information. Some of this is obvious but far too much of it
isn't. The only way to figure out what something is aligned to is to kill
it and see the faction hits it gives.. then you have to know what those
factions are.. most of which aren't obvious.

Anyway, any more information would be appreciated.

Azerin D'Tsalaroth who is maybe just a little too paranoid :)


-----Original Message-----
I don't know where you heard this but I have never been affected by hunting
in mistmoore. Of course the choice is yours but I don't know anybody who has
been affected by hunting there.

Naeeldar
